moniListDetails.message: Details about how monitored list works:

hostMatchRule1.message:
All the subdomain of the hosts in the list will be monitored.
e.g. if "youtube.com" is in the list, then "www.youtube.com", "music.youtube.com", etc. will be monitored at the same time

hostMatchRule2.message: Only HTTP and HTTPS pages are monitored. Other protocols like FTP are never monitored.

hostEditRule1.message:
Adding a super domain will eliminate all its subdomains from the list.
e.g. Suppose "www.youtube.com", "music.youtube.com" are in the list. If "youtube.com" is then added, both of them will be replaced by "youtube.com

hostEditRule2.message:
To add a new subdomain, you need to delete the parent domain first, and you must save the list before adding the subdomain.
e.g. Suppose "youtube.com" is in the list, and you want to add "www.youtube.com". You must delete "youtube.com" form the list and save it before adding "www.youtube.com" into the list.

whiteOverBlack.message:
Whitelist takes privilege over blacklist. 
e.g. If "youtube.com" is in the black list, while "music.youtube.com" is in the white list, the "music.youtube.com" will not be monitored

setDefDurDescription.message: Set the list of buttons shown on the unlock duration selection page

defDurFormat1.message: Multiple values should be split with comma.

defDurFormat2.message: Each value should be an integer, at least 1 and at most 1440. (by the way, 1440 mins = 24 hours)

defDurFormat3.message: At most 10 different values can be set, if more than 10 values are enter, first 10 valid values will be used.

timesUpMottoDetail.message: The motto to be displayed on times up page.

thanksMrHe.message: Great thanks to Mr. He. The idea of this extension is based on his video and app.

durSelectHint.message: Select the duration to unlock host:

hostMonitoredWarn.message: The host is already in the list.

hostMatchRule3.message: Matching IPv4 and IPv6 address is supported. Exact matching will be perform for these addresses.

mottosDetail1.message: Not necessarily a motto, can be any message you want, even rude words.

mottosDetail2.message: The maximum text length is 300 characters.

leaveOneTabDescribe.message: Leave one new tab when all tabs are to be closed by SecondLock

duplicatedOptionPageWarn.message: Other options pages are detected, this page will be closed.

msgOnTimesUp.message: Message to be display on time's up
